channel.title: AllstarScape [Cleaned] - release
channel.description:
[center]Hai guys. So, in looking through other forum topics with Allstar related sources, I decided to release the actual source and a base client without all the [u][b]bugs and glitches[/b][/u] throughout the home area and other places. I've had this source for a while and it's pretty much useless to me, so whoever wants it can have it and hopefully make something of it. Also, I eliminated all the present [u][b]nulls[/b][/u] in the shops and cleaned out most of the problems with the source. I also fixed the dragonfire shield problem, as it would locate itself in the wrong spot when equipped. Other than that, the source is basically original and hasn't been modified in any way.[/center]
[center][u][b]Download:[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/z6g6s3ynl4h5[/center]
[center][b]Same old home area minus the bugs and glitches.[/b] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/1fwio4.png[/img]
[b]Same old training area.[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/11j50km.png[/img]
[b]Fixed nulled shops.[/b] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/wladj7.png[/img][/center]
[u][b]Credits[/b][/u]
[ul][li][b]Mod Allstar - 75% [/b](for the source, duh)[/li] [li][b]Stupit - 20%[/b] (for the client base)[/li] [li][b]Me - 5%[/b] (for fixing minor bugs/glitches and correcting some equip bugs)[/li][/ul]

How do I spawn? When I do ::pickup it says to try it again. Please help!

ex. for money, you put 00995

item.title: AllstarScape [Cleaned] - release
item.dc:creator: @codyth codyth
item.description:
@codyth wrote:

Hi there! Im really confused!
Okay, so yeah Im looking to use this as my server, just to learn for a little bit untill I can create my own, so I figured this was a good place to start, with an easy source. I cant find where I change the server Ip in the server files, ive looked everywhere! Its supposed to be in the client.java correct? I think thats it. Im really new and just looking for this as a way to teach me how to be as good as any of you people. If one of you could help me out at all, post on here or please, please add me on skype @ penguinbboy. Thanks a ton.

PS: sorry for gravedigging>.<

Read full topic
